title: Avalon to waive 2016 single supplements
text:
Avalon to waive 2016 single supplements 28 July 2015 
Avalon Waterways is waiving single supplements for certain single travellers as an early booking offer on its 2016 European river cruise programme. 
The offer is available on anyone booking a Indigo Deck stateroom for all of its cruises. 
The deal is just one of several available, with couples being offered the choice of saving Â£500 or more or a free two-night hotel stay pre or post-cruise in cities including Vienna, Parague and Budapest. 
However, bookings must be made before September 15 in order to qualify. Readers' comments (1) Michael Edwards | Tue, 28 Jul 2015 12:49 pm 
Great news for single travellers
